function.name: Name
function.description: Description

function.name: abs
function.description: Returns the absolute value of a number.

function.name: round
function.description: Returns a number to the nearest integer.

function.name: neg
function.description: Returns the negative value of a number.

function.name: sqrt
function.description: Returns the square root of a number.

function.name: sqrt
function.description: Returns the square root of a number.

function.name: code
function.description: Returns the ASCII-code of a character.

function.name: decode
function.description: Returns the character of an ASCII-code.

function.name: ftoa
function.description: Converts a float to a string.

function.name: itoa
function.description: Converts a integer to a string.

function.name: atof
function.description: Converts a string to a float.

function.name: atoi
function.description: Converts a string to an integer.

function.name: isupper
function.description: Checks if the character is uppercase.

function.name: islower
function.description: Checks if the character is lowercase.

function.name: isspace
function.description: Checks if the character is blank.

function.name: fst
function.description: Returns the first item form a tuple of two items.

function.name: snd
function.description: Returns the second item from a tuple of two items.

function.name: min2
function.description: Returns the lowest value of two.

function.name: max2
function.description: Returns the highest value of two.

function.name: exp
function.description: Exponential function: 2.71828^number.

function.name: log
function.description: Log of a number.

function.name: cos
function.description: Cosinus of a number.

function.name: sin
function.description: Sinus of a number.

function.name: pi
function.description: Returns n(pi).

function.name: atan
function.description: Returns the inverse tangent of a value radians.

function.name: time
function.description: Switches the display for timing in output to on/off.

function.name: timedate
function.description: Return the datetime in a tuple (sec, min, hour, day, month, year).
Returns the count of items in the list.

function.name: hd
function.description: Returns the first item (head) from the list.

function.name: tl
function.description: Returns the last items(tail) from the list.

function.name: min
function.description: Returns the lowest value from the list.

function.name: max
function.description: Returns the highest value from the list.

function.name: sum
function.description: Returns the sum of all numbers in the list.

function.name: prod
function.description: Returns the product of all numbers in the list.

function.name: take
function.description: Returns a list with only the first X items.

function.name: drop
function.description: Returns a list without the first X items.

function.name: takewhile
function.description: Takes items form the list till the expression becomes false.

function.name: dropwhile
function.description: Drops items form the list till the expression becomes false.

function.name: filter
function.description: Filters out all the items that do not match the condition

function.name: and
function.description: Returns the truthvalue of the Boolean and-statement.

function.name: or
function.description: Returns the truthvalue of the Boolean or-statement.

function.name: member
function.description: Checks if the list contains a specific item.

function.name: empty
function.description: Checks if the list is empty.

function.name: merge
function.description: Merges two lists together by comparing each item in the first list to the item in the second.

function.name: concat
function.description: Concatenates two lists.

function.name: zip
function.description: Zips two lists into a list of X tuples. X is the count of items in the shortest list.

function.name: zip2
function.description: Zips two lists into a list of X tuples. X is the count of items in the shortest list.

function.name: zip3
function.description: Zips three lists into a list of X tuples. X is the count of items in the shortest list.

function.name: split
function.description: Splits the list in two at the specific index.

function.name: Splitwhile
function.description: Splits the list in two when the expression becomes false.

function.name: sort
function.description: Sorts the list.

function.name: mergeSort
function.description: Sort the list by merging.

function.name: reverse
function.description: Returns the list in it's reversed order.

function.name: nodup
function.description: Returns the list after removing duplicates.

function.name: map
function.description: Returns a list constructed by applying a function to all items in the list.

function.name: lines
function.description: Puts a string inside a list.

function.name: word
function.description: Puts a string inside a list.

function.name: unlines
function.description: Takes the string outside the list.

function.name: coordsToString
function.description: Converts a tuple of two numbers into a list of two strings.

function.name: ljustify
function.description: Adds length to the string if necessary, and alligns the string to the left.

function.name: rjustify
function.description: Adds length to the string if necessary, and alligns the string to the right.

function.name: cjustify
function.description: Adds length to the string if necessary, and centers the string.

function.name: rep
function.description: Creates a list containing X times a specific value.

function.name: nat
function.description: Creates a list of numbers ranging from the first argument to the second.

function.name: nats
function.description: Creates an endless list of numbers, starting from the specific number.

function.name: gennat
function.description: Creats a list of numbers ranging from num1 to num3, using steps of num2 - num1.

function.name: fwrite
function.description: Creates a functionn (arg1) and assigns a string (arg2) to it.

function.name: fappend
function.description: Appends a string (arg2) to the value of the function (arg1).

function.name: fread
function.description: Returns the value of the function that has been created by using 'fwrite'.
